channel.title: Alpha on Sad Robot
channel.description: Recent content in Alpha on Sad Robot

item.title: Opera 10 Alpha
item.description: Opera 10 Alpha is out! Apart from it being an updated and faster engine, it also adds 100% ACID3 support, HTML Email Composition (finally!), integrated spell checker, and automatic updates. All this on top of the in-built features like mouse gestures, integrated ad blocker, the slick mail, news feed and chat client, Bit Torrent support, Wand password manager, desktop widgets etc.
